title: Twice
text: Given a string S, find the longest substring that appears at least twice in S (occurrences may overlap).InputThe first line contains an integer L (1 ≤ L ≤ 200000), the length of S.The second line contains the string S, consisting of exactly L lowercase letters ('a'-'z').OutputOutput the length of the longest substring that appears at least twice in S. If there is no such substring, output 0.ExampleInput:11sabcabcfabcOutput:3Input:18trutrutiktiktappopOutput:4
